describe: Mozambique is a country located in Southeast Africa bordered by the Indian Ocean to the east. It is known for its rich cultural heritage, diverse wildlife, and stunning coastline. The country has a vibrant history influenced by Portuguese colonialism, and it is famous for its traditional music and dance.

cities.name: üèù Maputo
cities.geographical_location: Located in the southern part of Mozambique along the Indian Ocean coast.
cities.climate: Maputo has a tropical savanna climate with a hot and humid wet season from November to March and a cooler dry season from April to October.
cities.famous_cuisine: Matapa, a dish made from cassava leaves cooked in peanut sauce, and Piri Piri chicken.

cities.name: üèù Beira
cities.geographical_location: Situated in central Mozambique, along the coast of the Indian Ocean.
cities.climate: Beira experiences a tropical savanna climate with a distinct wet and dry season.
cities.famous_cuisine: Seafood dishes, particularly prawns and fish curry.

cities.name: üèù Pemba
cities.geographical_location: Located in the northern part of Mozambique on a peninsula in Pemba Bay.
cities.climate: Pemba has a tropical climate with a wet season from December to April and a dry season from May to November.
